评论详情: I got it to match my other jewelry from novica. Got a ring bangle bracelet tennis bracelet and have a necklace on the way. Love novica. Going to make my collection all novica.
This product was purchase as a gift so final approval/disapproval will be based on the receiver's opinion. The quality of the silver was "OK"  and the bracelet was pretty.
Item is beautiful however on my wedding day which was the first day I wore this bracelett a garnet stone feel out veg upset not happy

I have the same artist's matching "Scarlet Droplets" necklace and "Mystical Femme" (in garmet) earrings, and this bracelet looks nice worn with one or both of those pieces of jewelry. This is delicate-looking, not TOO challenging to open and close, and I'ved received several compliments on it so far. As someone with slender wrists I appreciate the adjustable nature of this one -- the tightest ring is perfect for me.  After six wearings this bracelet hasn't taken any visible damage (yet?) and hasn't tarnished very much yet, but I know from experience with the matching necklace that a few swipes with a jewelry polishing cloth will bring the light color and shine back when needed.
I was disappointed with this bracelet . it's not stamped sterling silver . Very light weight .

评论概述: I am happy with my bracelet
评论详情: I got this bracelet to match my garnet necklace. Very fine craft and high quality. I prefer smaller stones and it fits perfectly. This is a well-constructed bracelet. It is not cheap looking, either. If you are looking for a fine quality, real stones and craftsmanship this is the bracelet for you.  You will not be disappointed if that's what you are looking for. The bracelet is pretty and dainty; but very well made. Looks better than the picture

评论详情: Bracelet was beautiful, my mother loved it, no flaws. She liked that garnets matched her red fingernail polish.  Impressed w/ this company via the quality of merchandise.
This tennis bracelet is perfect.  It is comfortable to wear and well made with garnets that are a lovely deep color.
This is a beautiful bracelet and I love it!  I also think the option of connecting at several different jump rings for different sized wrists is wonderful.  I wish more jewelry were made like this.

评论概述: It looks pretty with a variety of styles as it is simple
评论详情: This is a lovely bracelet consisting of a delicate silver chain and small shiny garnets. It looks pretty with a variety of styles as it is simple.  My only concerns: The first bracelet I received lost one stone the first time I wore it. I will say to NOVICA's credit they responded promptly and offered to replace it. Since I had good experiences with other NOVICA accessories, I accepted their offer. The replacement is just as pretty and has not lost a stone. So I am happy.  My only other very minor concern, the bracelet is a little long for my wrist. I close it on the smallest ring but a little bit of chain dangles. This can be fixed by removing the extra jump rings; I just have not done it yet. However, wrist size is variable, so others may find it perfect in length.  All in all, I am very happy with this bracelet, so I still gave it a top rating. I have a couple other items by NOVICA's artists, and they have become a go-to brand for jewelry, decorative items, and gifts. I like their lovely packaging, quality items and their involvement of fairly paid artists from around the world.  I received this bracelet at a discount to review. All opinions expressed are my own.

评论概述: Their products are very high quality and their mission statement is just as great as the items that they sell
评论详情: It is no secret that I am a frequent Novica shopper. Their products are very high quality and their mission statement is just as great as the items that they sell. I decided to pick up this tennis bracelet, and I am so happy that I did! It is absolutely beautiful! It is a very simple design that is easily dressed up or down. It can go with so many outfits, which I really like since my wardrobe tends to be rather eclectic. I work with the public and when I wear it to work, I get so many compliments!  I received discount from the manufacturer in exchange for my honest opinion. I was not required or compelled to write a positive review. The opinions I have expressed are my own.
